content.title: Cryoglobulinemic Vasculitis
content.description: Small vessel vasculitis caused by cryoglobulin deposition, strongly associated with hepatitis C.

types.type_II: Mixed (monoclonal IgM + polyclonal IgG) - most common, HCV-associated

content.clinical_pearl: Always check hepatitis C serology and cryoglobulins in unexplained digital ischemia with purpura
